title: Highlight
text: Like Gabrielle Fountain's <I>Equilibrium<I> in this exhibition, <I>Highlight<I> employs an unabashedly broad range of bright colors. Phillips transitioned them from a reflective yellow to a bright fuchsia, creating a sense of three-dimensional, light-reflecting spherical forms, almost like a strand of dark pearls.  The enlargement of geometric form in this textile renders a pixilated effect, which draws from the graphics of early videogames and computer designs. <I>Highlight<I> was printed in multiple other colorways, including one incorporating an eye-popping teal, purple and red.
description: White ground; 3-1/2 circles formed by yellow, orange, red, purple and black rectangles
